items.title: Feel Calmer and Less Stressed in Just 5 Seconds: Dr. Andrew Huberman Says Take a ‘Physiological Sigh’
items.description: Breathe in, and in, and then slowly and fully out. Do that, and you’ll feel calmer, more focused, and a lot less stressed.
